comment: /**  * Checks whether any of the data buffers created by {@link #bufferFactory} have not been  * released, throwing an assertion error if so.  */
code: /**  * Checks whether any of the data buffers created by {@link #bufferFactory} have not been  * released, throwing an assertion error if so.  */ @After public final void checkForLeaks() {     this.bufferFactory.checkForLeaks(). }
